column1: - Diarrhea - Nausea - Redness, pain, and burning of the eyes - Severe burning in the mouth and throat - Swelling of the tongue, mouth, and eyes - Vomiting
Wash off any plant sap on the skin and in the eyes.

This may include: - Breathing support, including tube through the mouth into the lungs, and breathing machine (ventilator), in extreme cases only - Fluids through the vein (by IV) - Medications to treat symptoms
